message.content:
cs.PF, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.MA 

The paper discusses the problem of provisioning resources in cloud computing platforms, which is a topic related to performance evaluation and optimization of computer systems (cs.PF). The paper also deals with the issue of capacity planning and resource allocation in distributed systems (cs.DC). The use of matrix analytic methods to model the system behavior is a topic related to control and system theory (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the issue of network congestion and queuing theory, which is a topic related to computer networks (cs.NI). Finally, the paper presents a mathematical framework for computing expected revenue loss, which is a topic related to mathematical analysis (cs.MA).
